youtube.title: How Melasma Forms: The Science of Dark Spots Explained
youtube.description: Discover the biological process behind melasma and hyperpigmentation. This short animation shows how melanin-producing cells react to triggers, leading to dark patches on the skin. Learn the science of dermatology to better care for your skin! #Biology #Skincare #Melasma
